title: Business Analyst
description:
Role : Business Analyst

Location : Hyderabad

Experience : 5+ years

Job Type : Full-time

Job Summary

We are seeking an experienced and results-driven Business Analyst (BA) with prior experience in handling US/UK-based projects.

The ideal candidate will be responsible for gathering and analysing business requirements, driving process improvements, and working closely with cross-functional teams to deliver solutions that meet the specific needs of stakeholders in the US and UK markets.

As a key member of our team, you will play a critical role in ensuring seamless communication between global teams, providing strategic insights, and executing projects that enhance business performance.

Key Responsibilities


Engage with stakeholders from US/UK-based clients or teams to understand their business needs and gather detailed requirements.
Document and prioritize requirements, ensuring clarity and alignment with business objectives.
Facilitate workshops and meetings with stakeholders across different time zones (US/UK) to gather, validate, and refine business requirements.
Conduct in-depth analysis of business processes and workflows to identify gaps, inefficiencies, and areas for improvement.
Propose recommendations and assist in designing solutions to enhance business processes.
Collaborate with US/UK teams to implement process improvements that align with regional market needs.
Work closely with IT teams, product managers, and developers to design and implement solutions tailored for US/UK markets.
Ensure that all solutions meet the business requirements and are in line with local regulations and market dynamics.
Oversee the development and execution of test plans, including User Acceptance Testing (UAT) with teams based in the US/UK.
Serve as the primary point of contact between US/UK stakeholders and internal teams.
Communicate project progress, risks, and issues to stakeholders in both the US and UK, ensuring alignment and transparency.
Manage cross-time-zone collaboration, ensuring timely and effective communication between teams in different locations.
Analyze data trends to provide insights specific to the US/UK markets, identifying opportunities for optimization and business growth.
Prepare detailed reports and presentations to communicate findings and recommendations to senior leadership, with a focus on US/UK performance metrics.
Use business intelligence tools to generate reports tailored to US/UK stakeholder requirements.


Required Qualifications


Bachelor's degree in information technology, or a related field.
5+ years of experience in business analysis, with proven experience in handling US/UK projects.
Proficiency in gathering business requirements, process mapping, and data analysis, with a focus on international markets.
Familiarity with regulatory and compliance standards for business operations in the US/UK.
Strong experience in cross-functional collaboration, working with teams from different regions (US/UK).
Proficiency in project management tools and business analysis tools (e.g. , Jira, Trello, MS Visio, etc.
Knowledge of project management methodologies like Agile or Waterfall.
Strong written and verbal communication skills, especially in managing cross-regional communications.
Ability to manage projects across multiple time zones and communicate effectively with international teams
